channel.title: How do i makek gold crowns pop up when i talk
channel.description:
i have the char. rights to 3 but it wont show the gold crown when i say somthing. and one other thing how do i program santa to trade when i talk to him?
please i just started making a server... so im goin to have alot of questions lol
:confused: :o

item.title: How do i makek gold crowns pop up when i talk
item.dc:creator: @Steph1 .Steph
item.description:
@Steph1 wrote:

Player Rights goes from 0-3…

0 = Normal Member (Noob)
1 = Moderator (Silver Crown)
2 = Administrator (Gold Crown)
3 = Owner (Should be Gold Crown)

If not do this…

Open Client.java

Find this.

else out.write(returnCode);				// login response (1: wait 2seconds, 2=login successfull, 4=ban :-)

Then add this…

if (playerRights == 3) { out.write(2); //Crown fixup } else { out.write(playerRights); // mod level }

Should work. If it doesn’t… I dunno.
Good Luck. :o

Read full topic
item.source: How do i makek gold crowns pop up when i talk

item.title: How do i makek gold crowns pop up when i talk
item.dc:creator: @heavinlyevil heavinlyevil
item.description:
@heavinlyevil wrote:

Or if it’s not added on your server open cleint.java and serch for if(playerId == -1) out.write(7)

then under else out.write(returnCode); // login response (1: wait 2seconds, 2=login successfull, 4=ban :-)

you want to add if (playerRights == 3) { out.write(2); //Crown fixup } else { out.write(playerRights); // mod level }

then save and open the folder characters then open up the file name who u want to make admin and if you want them to be a p mod put player rights to 1 and for admin 2 and for owner 3
